oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-02-02 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 2, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys, and performers Rod Brasfield, Johnnie & Jack, Howdy Forrester, Jimmy Riddle, Pap's Jug Band, Bashful Brother Oswald, and Kitty Wells. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jimmy Riddle; Pap's Jug Band; Bashful Brother Oswald; Kitty Wells; Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Clarinet Polka (Jimmy Riddle) [continued from part 1] -- Roy Acuff introduces the Jug Band -- Thirty Days (Pap's Jug Band) -- Comedy routine (Bashful Brother Oswald, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Roy Acuff) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Roy Acuff introduces Kitty Wells -- Repenting (Kitty Wells) -- Roy Acuff introduces Bashful Brother Oswald -- Columbus Stockade Blues (Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Roy Acuff talks -- It's Hard To Love (Roy Acuff, Bashful Brother Oswald) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Roy Acuff) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Wells, Kitty; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Pap's Jug Band; Zinkan, Joe; Bashful Brother Oswald; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963
